name: ConspiracyRoulette
0:
”Alexa open conspiracy roulette”
”Tell me a conspiracy”
”Tell me another”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: conspiracy roulette
des:
Conspiracy Roulette is a Skill that lets you take a break from the real world by poking fun at conspiracy theories by creating random, whimsical theories that have absolutely no basis in reality.

When you open the Skill, you will hear an example generated at random. Then you can ask for as many as you like just by saying, “Tell me another conspiracy.” If you want to repeat the “Conspiracy” you hear, just say, “Repeat.” It is simple and fun!

Hope you enjoy it!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
